DISCLAIMER

Full disclosure and avoiding a conflict of interest are the guiding principles of Public Health Reports in all that we produce. Any views or opinions expressed on this disc do not necessarily represent those of Public Health Reports or the Association of Schools of Public Health. But, they might. After all, there exists no such thing as a unique opinion. However, we at PHR are at no fault for what has been presented and are immune, no pun intended, to any obligatory explanation. Further, all views or opinions presented are free from commercial bias.
